name: Marie-Claire Joseph
quote: EdLight gave me access to world-class education I never thought possible. The physics courses prepared me for university and changed my life trajectory.

name: Jean-Baptiste Pierre
quote: Through CISJ Labs, I built my first mobile app and learned to code. The mentorship and resources helped me launch my own startup.

name: Stephanie Laurent
quote: The Summer Leadership Program connected me with incredible mentors and peers. I learned leadership skills that I use every day in my community work.
